|      |                                      |               |               | 1. Download and Install the Gateway: You can download the On-premises data gateway from the Power BI service. After downloading, install the gateway on a machine that's always on and where the data sources are accessible.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | 2. Configure the Gateway: After installation, sign in with your Power BI account credentials. Choose "Register a new gateway on this computer", and then provide a name and recovery key for your gateway. Click Configure.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | 3. Add Data Sources: Once the gateway is set up, you need to add data sources that match the ones in your Power BI reports. In the Power BI service, go to 'Manage Gateways', select your gateway and click 'Add data source'. Fill out the necessary details for your data source.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | 4. Use Gateway in Power BI: Now when you're setting up a scheduled refresh in Power BI for your report, you'll see the option to use the gateway. Choose your gateway and data source, and set your refresh schedule as needed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | Remember to keep the gateway up to date, Microsoft releases updates to the gateway software regularly.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | The On-Premises Data Gateway supports more types of data sources and allows for greater flexibility. It also supports live query, multiple users, multiple data sources, and can be used by PowerApps, Azure Logic Apps, and Power Automate, in addition to Power BI.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | The Personal Gateway, on the other hand, is limited to a single user, and can only refresh data for import-based queries. It does not support live query or direct query.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | Therefore, for an SQL Server, or most business scenarios, the On-Premises Data Gateway is the best choice.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |

| 1887 | 894fe608-89b3-41df-8a21-107b9540450c | assistant     |   1.68728e+09 | I see the issue now. The problem is that the column order is not matching in the two SELECT statements of the UNION ALL. The SQL UNION operation requires the same number of expressions (columns) in the SELECT statements being united, and they must be of the same data type, and in the same order.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | finished_successfully | aaa294bd-b681-4a51-9969-8af401d0b92d |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | In the first SELECT, the 'Rules_' column comes before the 'REP CL Scheme' column, and in the second SELECT, 'Rules_' comes after 'REP CL Scheme'. Hence, when the UNION ALL operation is performed, the 'Rules_' column in the second SELECT is incorrectly mapping to the 'REP CL Scheme' column in the first SELECT, and vice versa. That's why you are seeing those decimal values when querying for 'Rules_' - you are actually seeing the values of 'REP CL Scheme'.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
